diagram: {"name":"Select Spanish as preferred language","desc":" Administrator - Selecting preferred language on the web-portal: in order to understand the web-portal an administrator should be able to select a preferred language for the web-portal  ","steps":[{"key":0,"name":"INIT","parent":-1,"__gohashid":429},{"key":1,"name":" the administrator wants to select a preferred language","parent":0,"__gohashid":430},{"key":2,"name":" the administrator selects Spanish as a new language","parent":1,"__gohashid":431},{"key":3,"name":"  the web-portal will show all text in Spanish","parent":2,"__gohashid":432},{"key":4,"name":"END","parent":3,"__gohashid":433}]}
